Quick search

Module: dish_delay_plot¶

This module contains functionality to get dish-based delay plots.

Reference¶

crosscal.dish_delay_plot.get_dish_delay_plots(obs_id, fluxcal, basedir=None)[source]¶

Simple function to plot the dish delay. This needs to run separately from the other crosscal plots because it requires all 40 beams to be accessible

Args:
obs_id (int): Taskid of the observation
fluxcal (str): Name of the flux calibrator
basedir (str): Optional directory of the taskid
